bioconda.name: pybedtools
bioconda.summary: Wraps BEDTools for use in Python and adds many additional features.

biocontainers.name: pybedtools
biocontainers.summary: Wraps BEDTools for use in Python and adds many additional features.

biotools.summary: Python extension to BEDTools that allows use of all BEDTools programs directly from Python, as well as feature-by-feature manipulation, automatic handling of temporary files, and more.

bioschemas.name: Pybedtools
bioschemas.summary: Python extension to BEDTools that allows use of all BEDTools programs directly from Python, as well as feature-by-feature manipulation, automatic handling of temporary files, and more.
